original_text:
So you will be delivered from the forbidden woman,
    from the adulteress with her smooth words,
korean_text: 지혜가 또 너를 음녀에게서, 말로 호리는 이방 계집에게서 구원하리니

sentences.original_text: So you will be delivered from the forbidden woman,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 금지된 여자에게서 건짐을 받을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: from the adulteress with her smooth words,
